description.db:para: This table is a demo table to be used by the Rate Cacher module to keep track of the prices for the traffic. More information can be found at: &OPENSIPS_MOD_DOC;rate_cacher.html.

column.name: id
column.description: Table primary key, not used by module

column.name: ani_prefix
column.description: ANI Prefix of the currenty entry in the ratesheet

column.name: ani_dst_name
column.description: Destination name for the above ANI Prefix of the currenty entry in the ratesheet

column.name: destination
column.description: Destination name for the DNIS of the current entry in the ratesheet

column.name: destination_id
column.description: Destination ID of the current entry in the ratesheet, used for matching between main and EU ratesheet

column.name: minimum
column.description: Minimum seconds to bill for this entry

column.name: increment
column.description: Increment to bill for this entry
